Text:
Hi and thanx for uploading!
There's some mixup regarding the titles, however. If the back-cover is correct there is 15 tiles in the album. In the download the 2 and 3 are the same song ("Are you happy now"), 13 "Everywhere" and 14 "The game of love" are missing. What have happened?
Rgrds / B

My apologies for the covers... I got them from a cover site.  The tracks are correct... it's the cover that is wrong :(

Thanks for the heads up
